name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **ReactJS**. Specialized in developing scalable **SaaS** solutions using **Microservices** and **Event-driven** architectures. Skilled in **DevOps** practices, including **CI/CD** implementation and cloud deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**. Strong background in low-code and no-code development, with expertise in documentation processes.

Additionally, I have hands-on experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms leveraging predictive analytics and real-time processing. I am well-versed in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, while also having a solid foundation in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
